Negative_Review: Hotel didn t feel like 5 stars more like medium 4 Lot s of minor shortcumings which add up to a overall mediocre experience
Positive_Review: Staff was nice External gym was perfect

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beautiful bedrooms and luxury bathroom with a bath and separate walk in shower Excellent food and very friendly and helpful staff Very convenient for transport links with the underground station a 2 minute walk away The area is very quiet on a weekend because most of the square mile closes at a weekend We ve already booked to come again

Negative_Review: A very minor point was limited cold water flow in our particular bedroom basin but otherwise hard to fault
Positive_Review: This is an oasis of calm in London The room itself was extremely quiet but as soon as you walk in from the street you feel you have left the busy ness behind The staff are very welcoming Site wise you are well placed to enjoy several of the historic aspects of the city We enjoyed the proximity to the river and St Katherine s Dock as well as The Tower

Negative_Review: It was all great if I was being very very picky the rooms are a bit of a squeeze and would have liked a bedside cab either side
Positive_Review: great location near to everything but relatively quiet at weekend as in city so peaceful A drink on arrival was a lovely touch too

Negative_Review: Parking is not at the hotel it s 5 min walk away and there s nowhere to stop outside The car park was too small for my car to get in so we ended up a 15 minute walk away and paid 38 00 fo the day Breakfast was 22 each so we went out
Positive_Review: Good room quiet and comfortable Good shower

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: We loved our room It was so cosy felt homely in a way The bed was so comfortable My photo does not do it justice The staff were really charming Nothing was too much trouble and the hotel in general was excellent Would happily stay there again It s only a 2 3 minute walk from Bank station which is a very central place to be in London

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I got upgraded because it was my birthday and I have gotten a bigger room that their usual standard It was a great surprise treat The room was extremely comfortable and everything was just great

Negative_Review: very poor price quality balance room was outdated connecting doors caused significant noise staff did not respond at all to complaints Will not use this hotel again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Having to leave
Positive_Review: Everything about this hotel was excellent I have stayed at hotels in London over the last 20 years at least every month This is the most characterful quality value for money establishment I have come across in that time A triumph Well done to all involved with the hotel An uplifting experience A complete pleasure

Negative_Review: Didn t like the breakfast area The bar was very small and felt like a walk through area
Positive_Review: Location very convenient Polite and friendly staff

Negative_Review: Wifi bad TV bad reception Had To wait so long for breakfast when it wasn t even busy
Positive_Review: Big room we had an upgrade which was nice Staff very nice

Negative_Review: hotel restaurant was shut at the weekend as are local places to eat due to hotel being in banking district in London
Positive_Review: good hotel near public transport

Negative_Review: The water in the shower doesn t get quite hot enough But really the ONLY thing that could be improved
Positive_Review: Beautiful space incredibly kind and attentive staff Great food wonderful tea time must be reserved 24 hours in advance Highly recommend

Negative_Review: Our room was boiling hot and it was pretty unbearable in the bathroom The shower head was blocked and water only came out of the sides We were only there for one night and when I expressed our concerns we were offered a drink Not really very adequate
Positive_Review: The staff could not have been more polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Breakfast is expensive
Positive_Review: MAin reason for booking was proximity to an event in Lombard Street Big plus was excellent service from friendly and courteous staff

Negative_Review: The one big disappointment was the lovely hot powerful shower was only suitable for person under 5 9 anyone taller has to crouch or continually hit their head It s not as if there was no space above to have the shower head higher
Positive_Review: Character beauty of its old life as a bank retained Quiet very comfortable stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent service from all hotel staff Beautiful interior design Understated Exterior Everything looks larger than it does in the website photos Supersonic room service About 90 seconds Beat that Great location Marco Pierre White restaurant in hotel Exquisite restaurant Excellent service from all restaurant staff Located amongst the modern architecture of London such as The Gherkin The Cheesegrater and The Walkie Talkie this exquisite modern hotel is camouflaged by its much older exterior architecture Only a small name plaque adorns the discreet entrance to an oasis of modern luxury and sophistication The perfect environment for the smart suited lady or gentleman to drink champagne My girlfriend and I chose this 5 star hotel as we were attending the ballet and wanted to feel comfortable in a hotel wearing evening dress and we did In a lesser starred hotel in the past we had felt out of place and uncomfortable The Marco Pierre White restaurant being the restaurant where hotel guests eat was a major factor in our choice of hotel Not all 5 star hotels have famous Chefs restaurants The room Our Deluxe Queen Room had a bath and a shower wet room with lots of marble and lovely toiletries Not a large room but not small it was beautifully furnished and was more impressive in d cor and size than it looked in the website photos Everything you need is in the room from robes and slippers to iron hairdryer and mini bar All I needed was ice Room service brought that with a big smile in about 90 seconds Beat that I will certainly return to this gorgeous place Enjoy your stay Mr SuitAndTie

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Attention to detail even the lemon in a little muslin bag to stop the pips falling out wonderful service and food drinks on arrival great location just really well looked after

Negative_Review: Carpets getting a little tired losing its freshness
Positive_Review: Beautiful building provides an excellent ambience for enjoying the stay Cheerful and helpful staff

Negative_Review: 23 for breakfast is a bit steep Went to Weatherspoons
Positive_Review: The rooms were beautifully presented and the staff very friendly and helpful The hotel oozes class and the decor and bar areas are very stylish Not cheap but worth splashing out

Negative_Review: The bar unfortunately wasn t as efficient as it could have been we ordered a meal which when it finally came 20 30 minutes later was cold the barman forgot to make one of our cocktails Pretty disappointing considering at the time we were the only 2 in there
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Breakfast was too expensive so opted out
Positive_Review: Loved everything about this hotel Welcome drinks free water and newspaper Coffee machine in room ice and water left out during the evening in the room by hotel staff Brilliant toiletries big bathroom and comfortable bed

Negative_Review: Due to our room having an interlocking door which was no longer in use the noise from the room next door did disturb us The toilet paper felt cheap which did not reflect the quality of the room
Positive_Review: Room was lovely and spacious the bed was really comfy and the bathroom was huge Nice fluffy towels

Negative_Review: Small room Not enough room to walk past TV cupboard Breakfast too expensive
Positive_Review: The building and location Quiet room allocated as requested Attentive service

Negative_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: Low water pressure in bathroom
Positive_Review: Great location very helpful friendly staff Requested slightly later check out time which they were more then happy to do for no extra charge

Negative_Review: One tiny criticism we were asked what type of water in the room said sparkly and still came but it did not really matter too much its a first world issue can think of others to get more stressed about
Positive_Review: Great breakfast

Negative_Review: Breakfast service was disappointing milk served in a teapot coffee luke warm and not enough staff Eventually got a cafeti re with hot coffee and a delicious English breakfast Please sort out the service as everything else is excellent
Positive_Review: Friendly staff immaculately clean delicious food in restaurant

Negative_Review: We asked reception about find a TV to watch some sport We were directed to the bar which didn t have a TV at all A little frustrating to have wasted our time on this

Negative_Review: If I have to find fault it would just be that the finish of the wooden bath panel was rather aged and the bathroom sliding door does not close flush to the door so there isn t proper privacy It s these little finishes that you would certainly expect to be of the highest standard from a room that would ordinarily be charged at 485
Positive_Review: The hotel decor and atmosphere was fantastic The food and service fabulous Overall two very happy customers Thank you

Negative_Review: Honestly I really cannot fault anything I didn t like having to leave
Positive_Review: The whole experience was fantastic What a truly stunning hotel cannot thank enough You definitely went that extra mile not sure the care and attention to our wishes could have been any more perfect Thank you so very much

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very nice hotel located in the heart of London City A lot of restaurants around like famous Burger ad Lobster which is just in from of hotel and Duck and Waffle in some 400 meters walk Metro station is also in some 3 minutes walk very convenient just taking a central line and going to Oxford street for shopping or any other place Hotel itself is very nice and quiet good breakfasts very clean and room service works very well Considering the location price is OK

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The service provided by the front of house staff is exceptional Nothing is too much trouble The ambience of the open lounge area is beautiful particularly when the sun is shining through the glass domed roof

Negative_Review: our room was nice but was on the ground floor with windows into a parking garage
Positive_Review: The staff in the bar were really nice and the concierge was absolutely amazing She helped us plan our activities prior to coming to London Very helpful

Negative_Review: Room size was small for a young family with an infant and a portacot
Positive_Review: Very close to several historical landmarks and those that weren t nearby were a train ride away from the very well serviced Bank station Building was absolutely stunning with award winning restaurants downstairs and along Threadneedle St

Negative_Review: Location Drove past it twice No signs or identifying marks No where to park or even drop off our luggage Nightmare on arrival
Positive_Review: Great room We had a suite with a huge balcony

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were courteous and despite arriving early we were offered a free upgrade and allowed access to the room The room was a good size and had all the facilities we required The hotel kept our bag at the end of our stay to allow us further time sightseeing Close to tube station

Negative_Review: I can t think about one thing that wasn t perfect
Positive_Review: Amazing bed and pillow Probably the best I ever had Very beautiful hotel and great value for your money

Negative_Review: Not enough milk and no shampoo conditioner but that was rectified upon calling room service
Positive_Review: Upgraded to a suite for a nominal fee Beautiful comfy rooms

Negative_Review: There was a lot of dark wood in our room which was a bit dated Also there was quite a big gap in the connecting door to the next room we saw the guest next door looking through We didn t have the breakfast as it seemed very expensive
Positive_Review: The Lobby with the glass dome is beautiful The location is fantastic

Negative_Review: Not a dislike but had to ask for extra teabags and milk as we had run out on the small supply which the Manager duly provided straight away thank you
Positive_Review: Great room facilities staff could not do enough for us even when it was raining umbrellas are available in the room or at the door

Negative_Review: We did have to wait a while for our room to become available but I believe that we were actually upgraded due to this
Positive_Review: The room was amazing and the staff were extremely pleasant helping me to find my lost phone The bed was incredibly comfortable and the bathroom was lovely with a great bath and shower

Negative_Review: Stayed here for my partners birthday and unfortunately our room was stinking hot which limited sleep we were told the air conditioning was broken and we could move rooms but didn t fancy it at 3am The next night we moved to a lovely room but the air conditioning was really noisy so unfortunately we didn t get much sleep all weekend and felt too tired to do much in the day Really disappointing
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The pipes made a constant loud whistling noise the shower did not have a nicely enclosed stall so water went everywhere and the bathroom smelled like mold You had to remove the plunger from the sink so water would go down
Positive_Review: The room was tidy and generally quiet

Negative_Review: Coffee machine in room didn t work either machine was broken or sockets not working Informed reception and they did not offer replacement we were checking out in 2 hours though
Positive_Review: Very comfy bed nice bathroom

Negative_Review: Maybe more choices at breakfast or a small buffet Being very picky the doormen were not very attentive
Positive_Review: The check in restaurant and bar staff were very helpful and friendly The quality of the breakfast was very good The bathroom toiletries were excellent The room was clean warm and comfortable There was also a nice ambiance in the hotel We will come back thank you

Negative_Review: Breakfast not good enough for the price There is a pret around the corner
Positive_Review: Deluxe room was big with a fantastic bathroom Excellent for central London Evening food in Wheelers was excellent It is 1min from bank tube station and central line Super easy travel and quiet at weekend

Negative_Review: The room was terribly noisy with the air conditioning on full all night It could not be turned off and we did not get any sleep we were told that we could change rooms but a 1am it was too late Upon checking out we were told that the Manager would contact us after the week end but heard know more I took the trouble to return to the Hotel and was told that I could have the money back from the breakfast
Positive_Review: No Positive

Positive_Review: Location interior spacious room and bathrooms Coffee machine amenities food from room service

Negative_Review: Glass door to the bathroom which would open on its own Nowhere to put hang bathrobe or towel close to the bathtub too big bathroom
Positive_Review: Excellent location Design of the room with big comfort and attention to detail The building itself with amazing dome big windows and high ceiling former bank a lot of dark wood and leather armchairs create impressive well established ambience smartly complemented by contemporary design features Great Xmas decorations and gorgeous scent at the entrance area

Negative_Review: Staff at breakfast could have been more attentive Providing tea coffee and clearing away used plates

Positive_Review: Everything This hotel is superb the rooms are fantastic the staff are so charming and helpful and go out of their way to assist Threadneedles is our favourite London hotel and although we have stayed there many times before it never fails to impress it is an oasis in the madness that is London

Negative_Review: Service for breakfast was unbelievably slow so the charge was deducted from our bill However there was nothing wrong with the standard of the food Apart from this slight complaint I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: The fact that the receptionist unhesitatingly gave us a different room after we had complained about noisy neighbours

Negative_Review: The Room Service facilities did not include serving any alcohol late at night and the mini bar did not have a great selection so this was the only downfall for us personally
Positive_Review: The location was great a short walk from Liverpool St Station and the Tube station Bank was very nearby making travel around London very easy Hotel felt very luxurious and was very tastefully and lavishly decorated Staff were really helpful and always smiling

Positive_Review: The staff were amazing and friendly the member of staff on reception when we checked in was expectional and very helpful the hotel room was amazing and the hotel was definately Worth its value good Location for all attractions also

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Quiet part of London yet near enough to get to key places quickly Beautiful old bank building upgraded and tastefully and creatively reworked into a hotel

Negative_Review: small room no buffet breakfast pork breakfast or starving breakfast not a 5 star hotel standard maybe 3stars move on
Positive_Review: i dont know maybe to wait for the wrong room until 4pm

Negative_Review: The staff were unfriendly and didn t make us feel welcome and it went downhill from our arrivial We waited constantly for someone to answer our room service calls and the food was very underwhelming especially the breakfast which we paid 60 for the misfortune of having When we finally got an answer to our calls there was no acknowledgement of the delay and the staff were abrupt in their tone That said the chambermaids were very polite and the most welcoming of all the hotel staff We stayed during 24th 25th Dec and it appears they were understaffed so that might account for the less than 5 experience
Positive_Review: Hotel was quiet and clean the suite was comfortable

Negative_Review: Very busy reception when checking in so slow to be served in and no help offered taking bags to room Details missing in a 5 hotel
